table_utils.sql_template: select TRD_VOL_UNION.COB_DT, TRD_VOL_UNION.FEED_SRC_SYS, MAN_REF_MKT_OF_SETL.FIRM_AGT, TRD_VOL_UNION.EXCH, SUM(TRD_VOL_UNION.ITEM_CNT), SUM(TRD_VOL_UNION.CALC_USD_AMT), SUM(TRD_VOL_UNION.CON_USD_AMT), TRD_VOL_UNION.VOL_EVNT_TYP, TRD_VOL_UNION.TRD_STA, TRD_VOL_UNION.OWN_CD_3, TRD_VOL_UNION.CTP_NAM, TRD_VOL_UNION.SETL_LOCA, TRD_VOL_UNION.TRAN_TYP_1, MAN_REF_MKT_OF_SETL.CTRY_DESC, TRD_VOL_UNION.CTP_MNEMONIC, TRD_VOL_UNION.LCL_CCY, TRD_VOL_UNION.LGL_ENTY_NAM_PP, LGL.LGL_ENTY_NAM, TRD_VOL_UNION.SETL_BANK_LOC, SUM(TRD_VOL_UNION.USD_AMT), TRD_VOL_UNION.BUY_SELL, TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_ONE_CD, TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_ONE_DESC, TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_TWO_CD, TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_TWO_DESC, TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_THR_CD, TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_THR_DESC, ASET.ASET_LVL_2_DESC, ASET.ASET_LVL_0_DESC, ASET.ASET_LVL_3_DESC, ASET.ASET_LVL_1_DESC, TRD_VOL_UNION.EXEC_TYP, TRD_VOL_UNION.TRAN_TYP, TRD_VOL_UNION.FIRM_ACCT_MNEMONIC, --REF_ESALES_FIRM.MNEMONIC, REF_ESALES.MNEMONIC, MAN_REF_MKT_OF_SETL.CTRY_CD_2, TRD_VOL_UNION.OWN_CD_1, TRD_VOL_UNION.OWN_CD_2, TRD_VOL_UNION.OWN_CD_4, --CSMARTREF.REF_SMC.SCR_TYP_LVL_1, --CSMARTREF.REF_SMC.SCR_TYP_LVL_2, --CSMARTREF.REF_SMC.SCR_TYP_LVL_3 , --CSMARTREF.REF_SMC.PROD_LNG_DESC, LGL.LGL_ENTY_ID from ( select a.*, a1.TRAN_TYP_1, a1.TRD_STA_7 ,a1.TRD_STA_10, a1.TRAN_TYP_4, a1.OWN_CD_1, a1.OWN_CD_2, a1.OWN_CD_3,a1.OWN_CD_4 from (SELECT * FROM csmartvol.TRD_VOL_UNION partition (jan_111) a where a.src_file_cd IN ( 'DOGS','IOWA') and a.METRICS_CAT IN ( 'Volumes') ) a, (SELECT * FROM csmartvol.TRD_VOL_UNION_1 partition (jan_111) where src_file_cd IN ( 'DOGS','IOWA') ) a1 where 1=1 and a.TRD_VOL_SID=a1.TRD_VOL_SID and a.COB_DT=a1.COB_DT and a.SRC_FILE_CD=a1.SRC_FILE_CD AND ( a.ASET_LVL_ONE_CD <> 'FNC' AND a.VOL_EVNT_TYP <> 'Hand Ticket' AND a1.TRAN_TYP_1 IN ( 'BUY','SELL','PURCHASE','SALE' ) AND a1.OWN_CD_2 <> 'Prime Brokerage' ) ) TRD_VOL_UNION , ( select /*+parallel(man_ref_aset_lvl_data,3) */ * from csmartref.man_ref_aset_lvl_data where aset_lvl_0_desc in ('Equity','Fixed Income') ) ASET , ( select /*+parallel(MAN_REF_MKT_OF_SETL,3) */ * from csmartref.MAN_REF_MKT_OF_SETL where CTRY_DESC NOT IN ( 'Dummy' ) and FIRM_AGT NOT IN ( 'DTC','SBINC-SBUKE MISC EURO','MISC LONDON','LDC HC BANK NY USD','DUMMY AGENT','BANK OF NYK DKK','CONTROL' ) ) MAN_REF_MKT_OF_SETL , ( select /*+parallel(REF_ESALES,3) */ * from csmartref.REF_ESALES where MNEMONIC NOT IN ( 'ZAOCGMLN','ATHEXCCP','ATHEXPR','EMCFBATE','EMCFBATU','EMCFCHCP','EMCFUKCP','ENEXTAMS','EUREXEXE','IOBCCP','LPAREX','MLNCCPA','MLNCCPC','MLNCCPD','MLNCCPE','MLNCCPL','MLNCCPM','OEKBCCP','OMXEU','OMXEURO','OMXNORF','OMXNORS','OMXUK','OMXUKRO','SSSBSSA','TURKEU','TURKUK','UKE355B','VRTCCP','XETCCA','XETCCP','18BUYIN','18CROSS','18LATE','18SEHK','TSX' ) ) ref_esales , ( (select XREF.lgl_enty_key, DAT.lgl_enty_id, DAT.lgl_enty_nam from csmartref.man_ref_lgl_enty_data DAT , CSMARTREF.man_ref_lgl_enty_xref XREF where XREF.lgl_enty_id = DAT.lgl_enty_id (+) ) ) LGL where TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_KEY = aset.ASET_LVL_KEY and TRD_VOL_UNION.ACTL_MKT_OF_SETL_CD=MAN_REF_MKT_OF_SETL.FIN_INSM_KEY (+) and REF_ESALES.ACCOUNT_ID(+)=TRD_VOL_UNION.CTP_UID_GRD and TRD_VOL_UNION.lgl_enty_key = lgl.lgl_enty_key (+) group by TRD_VOL_UNION.COB_DT, TRD_VOL_UNION.FEED_SRC_SYS, MAN_REF_MKT_OF_SETL.FIRM_AGT, TRD_VOL_UNION.EXCH, TRD_VOL_UNION.VOL_EVNT_TYP, TRD_VOL_UNION.TRD_STA, TRD_VOL_UNION.OWN_CD_3, TRD_VOL_UNION.CTP_NAM, TRD_VOL_UNION.SETL_LOCA, TRD_VOL_UNION.TRAN_TYP_1, MAN_REF_MKT_OF_SETL.CTRY_DESC, TRD_VOL_UNION.CTP_MNEMONIC, TRD_VOL_UNION.LCL_CCY, TRD_VOL_UNION.LGL_ENTY_NAM_PP, LGL.LGL_ENTY_NAM, TRD_VOL_UNION.SETL_BANK_LOC, TRD_VOL_UNION.BUY_SELL, TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_ONE_CD, TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_ONE_DESC, TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_TWO_CD, TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_TWO_DESC, TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_THR_CD, TRD_VOL_UNION.ASET_LVL_THR_DESC, ASET.ASET_LVL_2_DESC, ASET.ASET_LVL_0_DESC, ASET.ASET_LVL_3_DESC, ASET.ASET_LVL_1_DESC, TRD_VOL_UNION.EXEC_TYP, TRD_VOL_UNION.TRAN_TYP, TRD_VOL_UNION.FIRM_ACCT_MNEMONIC, --REF_ESALES_FIRM.MNEMONIC, REF_ESALES.MNEMONIC, MAN_REF_MKT_OF_SETL.CTRY_CD_2, TRD_VOL_UNION.OWN_CD_1, TRD_VOL_UNION.OWN_CD_2, TRD_VOL_UNION.OWN_CD_4, --CSMARTREF.REF_SMC.SCR_TYP_LVL_1, --CSMARTREF.REF_SMC.SCR_TYP_LVL_2, --CSMARTREF.REF_SMC.SCR_TYP_LVL_3 , --CSMARTREF.REF_SMC.PROD_LNG_DESC, LGL.LGL_ENTY_ID;
